This is a `Quarto` website.

This website contains slides from the short course on GAMLSS given in November 2023 at the Universidade Federal de Pernambuco, Recife, Pernambuco - Brasil as part of the Workshop on Applied Statistics and Stochastic Possesses, `WASPP 2023` <https://www.pgest-ufpe.org/wassp>.
